com.almasb.fxgl.gameplay

Interface NotificationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AchievementListener

    public interface NotificationService
extends AchievementListener
    Notification service allows to push notifications. This is a globally available service with globally visible notifications.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
